operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_seq_updates (user_id, seq, update_type, update_data, date2) VALUES (:user_id, :seq, :update_type, :update_data, :date2)

operation.name: SelectLastSeqByUserId
operation.sql: SELECT seq FROM user_seq_updates WHERE user_id = :user_id ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1
